alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 9:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns, north central Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 928 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 15 miles east of Sawgrass to Baymeadows to near Mandarin. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Unf, Mandarin, Arlington, Ponte Vedra Beach, Fruit Cove, Neptune Beach, Baymeadows and Ortega. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
